verbs.description: heathenize (third-person singular simple present heathenizes, present participle heathenizing, simple past and past participle heathenized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To render heathen; to convert to heathenism.
examples: The continuance of these unscriptural terms, without an exact application of them in sermons and catechisms, heathenizes all the common people, nay and great numbers of not unlearned persons.
